name: rk-groups-jekyll
description: RK Groups Jekyll site with performance optimizations

scripts.minify: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-js: npx terser sw.js -o sw.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser site-links.js -o site-links.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser check-hrefs.js -o check-hrefs.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser report-issue.js -o report-issue.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser companies/rk-oxygen/gorakhpur/details.js -o companies/rk-oxygen/gorakhpur/details.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run minify && echo 'Assets minified successfully'
